page.title: 07HOUSING-A CONTRAST
page.content: On one side of Parkhouse Road is the built up area of South Nitshill . There are lots of rented houses and flats so many people live there .There are churches ,schools and some shops and plenty of buses to serve the residents . On the other side of the main road and on an area which used to be all fields you will find a new estate of bought houses .How quiet it is here overlooking green fields bordered by hedges .We found no shops or schools here in fact people have to own a car to carry shopping and take their children to school ."The place has changed," said the farmer's wife at Darnley Mill Farm which is at the crossroads of busy Nitshill ,Parkhouse ,and Kennishead Road ."We have some beef cattle and grow hay for the Winter feeding on our farm still ."
